In England, in the seven days to 28 April, there were 78,237 new confirmed cases (138.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 April, there were 122,014 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 36% (43,777 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 May is 18,565,456 (32,830.1 cases per 100,000 population).
